Package nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.common

A package for components shared by multiple core packages.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ActorInfo
    Contains info on actors in the board.
    Application
    Application Interface - Controls User Input
    GameState
    Contains the Level, Time, and MazeState
    ItemInfo
    Contains info on items in the board.
    Maze
    This acts as an interface between the maze (board and logic of the game) and the rest of the program.
    MazeState
    Contains the maze (board) and metadata about the maze
    Notice
    An interface for notices to be displayed atop the board.
    Persistence
    Persistence Interface.
    Renderer
    An interface for rendering the content of the game.
    TileInfo
    Contains info on tiles in the board.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Util
    A class that provides methods that perform simple useful tasks that don't fit anywhere else
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Direction
    Contains the 4 directions, north, south, east, west.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidMazeElementException
    This error is thrown when a itemInfo, tileInfo, or actorInfo is made for the MazeState that contains invalid data.
    LoadPluginException
    Thrown when there is any kind of error loading the classes in the level as a plugin

Package nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.common Description

A package for components shared by multiple core packages. Mainly comprised of interfaces serving as a base for the core classes of the game.
